extension.name: Meta Keys
extension.description: The Meta Keys field allows you to add arbitrary pieces of information to entries identified by user generated keys

media.item: Meta Keys: The Meta Keys field allows you to add arbitrary pieces of information to entries identified by user generated keys

releases.release: - Add new filter option, `key-contains`, thanks @nilshoerrmann - Improve range filtering with `key-ranges` @nilshoerrmann - Fix XML Importer import functionality, thanks @jurajkapsz - Allow zero to be a real value, thanks @jurajkapsz
- Add German localisation - Add importable/exportable field functionality
- Add filtering support for numeric data, see the README - Fix potential JS error with the duplicator

- Duplicator updates (orderable and sortable), thanks @kanduvisla! - Implement XMLImporter's updated `prepareImportValue` function, thanks @nilshoerrmann! - Sanitize keys and allow keys to be assigned a default value, thanks @kanduvisla! - Add Russian language, thanks @alexbirukov - Minor cleanups to CSS/README
- Support for Symphony 2.3 - Update to use default Symphony duplicator
- Explicitly state UTF-8 for tables (thanks @kanduvisla) - Fix bug when deleting empty keys (thanks @kanduvisla)
- Cleanup of extension for S2.2 - Added Romanian translation (thanks Vlad)
- Fix output error when only one key/value pair was added
- Few CSS Tweaks to make Meta Keys play better with other fields - Fix Safari autofocus bug
